title: How I tripled my Amazon KDP sales in 1 month ( Keyword Research For Beginners )

tactics.name: Keyword Research with Bookbeam
tactics.description: Identify profitable niches using Bookbeam's filters and keyword analysis tools.
steps: Select marketplace and preset filters (e.g., top-selling self-published books)
Filter by book age (e.g., 8 months) to find newly successful titles
Analyze keyword volume, competitors, and BSR data
caveats: Requires manual verification of keyword relevance
source_quotes: I use Bookbeam to find keywords with low competitors and high search volume.

tactics.name: Category Selection Strategy
tactics.description: Choose categories with achievable top rank thresholds and manageable competition.
steps: Use Category Explorer to select marketplaces and book formats
Filter categories by top rank ranges (e.g., 20K-40K BSR)
Prioritize categories with low review counts and high sales potential
caveats: Requires ongoing sales tracking to validate assumptions
source_quotes: Categories with 20K-40K BSR are manageable to compete in.

tactics.name: Book Tracker Analysis
tactics.description: Monitor books using Book Tracker to analyze bestseller rankings, reviews, and keywords
steps: Check estimated daily royalties and reviews
caveats: Less effective for niche markets with low competition
source_quotes: the first look at the book tracker this tool is used to Monitor and analyze data on books

tactics.name: Keyword Generator
tactics.description: Find related keywords for Amazon listings using a keyword generator tool
caveats: May generate irrelevant keywords for niche topics
source_quotes: now when crafting an Amazon listing you need keywords for the books title description

heuristics.name: Low Review Boost
heuristics.condition: If median_reviews is less than 200, then boost
source_quotes: I pay attention to recently published books with lower reviews indicating potential demand.

heuristics.name: Review Count Threshold
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are less than 200, prioritize keywords
source_quotes: this tool shows you the average person number of competitors and set volume of that keyword

claims.statement: Amazon bestseller badges signal trust and product quality to shoppers.
source_quotes: Amazon's best seller badge signals to shoppers that the product sells well.

claims.statement: Bookbeam provides estimated daily sales and royalty data for Amazon listings
source_quotes: this tool shows you the estimated daily sales estimated royalties and the age of the listing

niche_patterns.description: Target underserved subniches with specific identity, problem, and constraint combinations.
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Creates focused demand with lower competition and higher monetization potential
source_quotes: I look for subniches that appear more than three times in the list.
